wordcram
Class RandomWordNudger

java.lang.Object
  wordcram.RandomWordNudger
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordNudger
public class RandomWordNudger
extends java.lang.Object
implements WordNudger

A RandomWordNudger, where each attempt's PVector has X & Y coords distributed randomly around the desired point, multiplied by a standard deviation, and multiplied by the attempt number (so it gets farther, as it gets more desperate).

Constructor Summary
RandomWordNudger()
          Create a RandomWordNudger with a standard deviation of 0.6.
RandomWordNudger(float stdDev)
          Create a RandomWordNudger with your own standard deviation.
 
Method Summary
 processing.core.PVector nudgeFor(Word w, int attempt)
          How should this word be nudged, this time?

Method Detail

nudgeFor

public processing.core.PVector nudgeFor(Word w,
                                        int attempt)
Description copied from interface: WordNudger
How should this word be nudged, this time?

Specified by:
nudgeFor in interface WordNudger
Parameters:
w - the word to nudge
attempt - how many times WordCram has tried to place this word; starts at zero, and ends at (int)((1.0-word.weight) * 600) + 100
Returns:
the PVector to add to the word's desired location, to get the next spot to try fitting the word
